column.Name: SimOrderFormId
column.Description: OrderForm that is used for orders that are created using the SIM interface

column.Name: Accreditation
column.Description: Contains the accreditation flags, Q for RVA and V for Vito. Can contain both

column.Name: ReportCode
column.Description: Short code for outsourcing on report.

column.Name: LaboratoryId
column.Description: Laboratory that is responsible for this test

column.Name: UpdateLIMS
column.Description: LIMS is updated with these specification results

column.Name: Reported
column.Description: Determines if the specification is reported

column.Name: ResultId
column.Description: Result that created the specification item

column.Name: LowerLimitRounding
column.Description: Result is rounded before checking, R for rounding, S for siginifcant figures

column.Name: UpperLimitRounding
column.Description: Result is rounded before checking, R for rounding, S for siginifcant figures

column.Name: ExternalName
column.Description: External name to use in looking up the data

column.Name: Date
column.Description: Month of the quality costs data

column.Name: Credits
column.Description: Sum of credits sent to clients in a month

column.Name: RateAQC
column.Description: Cost price for AQC failures that month

column.Name: RateComplaint
column.Description: Cost price for complaints that month

column.Name: NearAccidents
column.Description: Number of near accidents that day

column.Name: HrsWorked
column.Description: Number of hours worked that day

column.Name: HrsWorkedOnSR
column.Description: Number of hours worked on sample reception that day

column.Name: HrsOff
column.Description: Number of hours off that day

column.Name: HrsMedical
column.Description: Number of hours spend on medical issues that day

column.Name: HrsNonProd
column.Description: Number of non productive hours that day

column.Name: Shift25
column.Description: Allowance in hours for a 25% shift

column.Name: Shift50
column.Description: Allowance in hours for a 50% shift

column.Name: Shift100
column.Description: Allowance in hours for a 100% shift

column.Name: ShiftNight75
column.Description: Allowance in hours for a 75% night shift

column.Name: ShiftNight100
column.Description: Allowance in hours for a 100% night shift

column.Name: ResourceName
column.Description: Name(s) of the resource(s) that spend non productive hours

column.Name: Allocation
column.Description: Allocation of the non productive hours

column.Name: HrsSpend
column.Description: Number of hours spend on the task

column.Name: OtherHrsDesc
column.Description: Specification of other non productive hours

column.Name: Date
column.Description: Date of the label check registration

column.Name: ReportedTotal
column.Description: Number of label checks reported total

column.Name: ReportedOnTime
column.Description: Number of label checks reported on time

column.Name: ReportedTranslated
column.Description: Number of label checks reported translated

column.Name: ReportedOutsTrans
column.Description: Number of label checks reported with outsourced translation

column.Name: Date
column.Description: Date of the reporting delay registration

column.Name: Days
column.Description: Number of days delay in reporting

column.Name: Date
column.Description: Date of Customer Satisfaction Score registration

column.Name: ActualTurnover
column.Description: Actual turnover for month and department

column.Name: Value
column.Description: Target value for a specific QHSE parameter

column.Name: Failures
column.Description: Number of Legionella AQC Failures for Month
